thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorsgroup.com
thread.title: Mary
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text: My husband and I are very pleased with our experience with AAG. The representative who helped us was excellent. Victor Carr sent the materials to us to review very quickly. He did not try to pressure us at any time. We reviewed the information and asked for time to decide what we wanted to do. Mr. Carr did not pressure us and only contacted us again after the time we requested passed. We appreciated this very much. He kept us informed on where the application stood and what was expected. in addition, I was able to contact him by phone and/or email with any questions that we had. We feel our experience was excellent, 5 Stars well-deserved. Sincerely, Mary
